explanation: [0-0] A man in a red hoodie is holding a long green balloon in his left hand and raising his right hand in front of him, smiling as he watches. Behind him, on a white wall, there is an alarm clock that shows the numbers 5 and 7, and a logo.

[0-2] Then he turns his left hand under the balloon, and the balloon suddenly flies away. The man in the red hoodie opens his eyes wide in surprise. Then the scene switches to a blue door. The door opens to the right, and a man with long, curly blonde hair in a blue robe appears at the door, looking to the left in surprise.

[2-5] Then the scene switches back to the man in the red hoodie. He is holding a yellow air pump in one hand and a balloon in the other, inflating a pink balloon. The man with long curly blonde hair watches with his eyes rolling. The man in the red hoodie happily holds up a long pink balloon and a long yellow balloon.

[5-7] Then the pink and yellow balloons in the hands of the man in the red hoodie are taken away by the man with the long curly blonde hair. The man in the red hoodie widens his eyes in surprise and looks to the left.

[7-11] Afterward, the man with the long curly blonde hair quickly twists the pink and yellow balloons together and turns them around. The man in the red hoodie stares in surprise. Then the man with the long curly blonde hair hands the butterfly made of balloons to the man in the red hoodie. The man in the red hoodie takes it with a smile. Then the man with the long curly blonde hair walks out and closes the blue door.
